name: 90-Second Breakfast Keto Bread
author: FrackFamily5 CA—>CT
summary: I've tweaked a few recipes to come up with this microwave keto bread. It's my go-to for fried egg and bacon breakfast sandwiches. The onion powder gives this a great flavor. Cut in half horizontally and fry up in the skillet or toast in the toaster oven for best results.
directions: Melt butter in a 4-inch ramekin in the microwave on high, about 25 seconds
Carefully remove from the microwave with a pot holder
Add almond flour, Cheddar cheese, onion powder, and baking powder; mix until combined
Microwave on high until set, about 90 seconds
Remove from the microwave and let stand for 1 minute
Run a butter knife around the edges and invert onto a plate
Cut horizontally to make 2 pieces of bread
